title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 324.5 - Permissive membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 324.5 - Permissive membership

State Regulations

Those persons who are deemed to be in part-time employment
pursuant to section
324.2
of this Part shall be
entitled to join the New York State Employees' Retirement System, and they
shall be so advised by their employer. Their membership shall become effective
upon the filing of an application therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
324.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
